title: Veg Mayo Sandwich
description: A medley of fresh veggies and creamy mayo, tucked between slices of bread for a delightful crunch.
ingredients: 1/2 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, bell peppers, cucumber, etc.), finely chopped
steps: In a bowl, mix together mayonnaise, mixed vegetables, mashed potatoes, boiled sweet corn, black pepper powder, and salt to make the filling.
Spread the filling evenly on one slice of bread and cover it with another slice.
Heat a pan and apply butter on the outer sides of the sandwich.
Toast the sandwich on both sides until it turns golden brown and the filling is heated through.
Remove from heat, slice the sandwich diagonally, and serve your Veg Mayo Sandwich.

title: Chicken Burger
description: Juicy, flavorful, and stacked to perfection, this burger is a meat lover's dream.
steps: Cook the chicken patties in a pan or on a grill until fully cooked.
Toast the burger buns on a griddle until they are lightly browned.
Place a lettuce leaf on the bottom half of each bun.
Add a chicken patty on top of the lettuce.
Place a cheese slice, tomato slices, and onion slices on the chicken patty.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Spread ketchup and mustard sauce on the top half of the buns.
Cover the burgers with the top bun halves.
Serve your Chicken Burger with your favorite sides.

title: Chicken Sandwich
description: Tender chicken meets your favorite toppings in a handheld masterpiece that's a flavor explosion.
ingredients: 2 boneless chicken breasts, cooked and shredded
steps: In a bowl, mix the shredded chicken with mayonnaise, salt, and pepper.
Toast the slices of bread until they are lightly browned.
Place a lettuce leaf on two slices of bread.
Add a generous portion of the chicken mixture on top of the lettuce.
Add tomato slices and onion slices.
Top with the remaining slices of bread to form sandwiches.
Slice the sandwiches diagonally and serve your Chicken Sandwich.

title: Veg Burger
description: A veggie delight, where a delicious patty and fresh fixings unite to satisfy your burger cravings.
steps: Cook the veggie patties in a pan or on a grill until they are heated through.
Toast the burger buns on a griddle until they are lightly browned.
Place a lettuce leaf on the bottom half of each bun.
Add a veggie patty on top of the lettuce.
Place a cheese slice, tomato slices, and onion slices on the veggie patty.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Spread ketchup and mustard sauce on the top half of the buns.
Cover the burgers with the top bun halves.
Serve your Veg Burger with your favorite sides.
